item.title: Week 7: Cases and Examples of Learning Analytics
item.description: Over the past few weeks, we have explored multiple dimensions of Learning Analytics – ethical, epistemological, conceptual/theoretical, pedagogical, technical – and have devleoped nuanced understanding of this field. Bringing together perspectives from distinctive disciplines into meaningful conversations takes time. I’m proud of our collective work so far in the community! Thanks to information shared by Crystal, I attended a panel named “Big Data and the Future of Social Research” organized by the College of Liberal Arts.
